metadata.title: CVE-2022-42800 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iOS15.7.1 and iPadOS 15.7.1, macOS Ventura 13, watchOS 9.1, iOS 16.1 andiPadOS 16, macOS Monterey 12.6.1, macOS Big Sur 11.7.1. A user may be ableto cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: zlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rsync: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
